column4: I need help, I want to install ubuntu server on a HDD 4GB in size, 256MB RAM, and 233MHz processor (AT FormFactor). Can anyone point me to the current ubuntu version?
I got "Killed" repeatly on the screen and I didn't do anything
and what was the error installing?
I don't know. It was like this: Killed (new line and tab) Killed (new line and tab) Killed (new line and tab) repeatly
are you installing a gui or just cli
I havent installed the 10.04 server whats the install like is it graphical or text based?
loading optional features or something, around 25%
download the 10.04 minimal iso and install LAMP, postfix ftp etc via apt
